ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces frozen limeade concentrate, thawed
des: "It tastes just like the pie, minus the crust (now if they would just invent a graham cracker flavored liqueur...)."
ins: Place the lime wedges in the bottom of a mixing glass and muddle them well. Cover with ice, and pour in vodka, lime juice, and vanilla. Shake well, then strain into two stemmed cocktail glasses. Garnish each with a twist of lime.
